original_text: At the end of three days after they had made a covenant with them, they heard that they were their neighbors and that they lived among them.
korean_text: 그들과 조약을 맺은 후 사흘이 지나서야 그들이 이웃에서 자기들 중에 거주하는 자들이라 함을 들으니라

sentences.original_text: After they had made a covenant with them,
at the end of three days,
and that they lived among them.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 가운데 살고 있다는 것을 들었다.
